function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with safety measures, such as social distancing and mask usage","Impact":"Increased likelihood of virus transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, targeted messaging, and enforcement of safety measures","Technologies":"Communication technologies for disseminating information and public health monitoring systems","People":"Young people and young adults","Owner":"Authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Perception of invincibility among young people and young adults","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to low adherence to safety measures","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns emphasizing vulnerability and seriousness of the virus, targeted messaging","Technologies":"Social media platforms, mobile apps for information dissemination","People":"Young people and young adults","Owner":"Authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness about the seriousness of the COVID-19 situation","Impact":"Contributes to the spread of the virus due to mild symptoms and lack of precautionary measures","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, public health messaging, targeted communication","Technologies":"Public health information websites, mobile apps for symptom tracking","People":"General population, with a focus on young people and young adults","Owner":"Authorities, public health organizations"}]}
